api_list.name: Generate RFC
api_list.description: Generate RFC (Tax Id) with the required information
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://generate-rfc.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/generate-rfc"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "generate-rfc.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
